name: Abhinav Gunnammagari
role: Associate Software Engineer (AIML) | Data Engineer | AI/ML Enthusiast
summary: Results-driven engineer passionate about building intelligent and scalable data systems. Skilled in designing automation workflows, AI-powered systems, and data pipelines that drive actionable insights and predictive analytics.

experience.title: Associate Software Engineer (AIML)
description: Designed and deployed automated data ingestion pipelines for enterprise Data Intelligence Platforms integrating multi-source data.
Built and containerized microservices with Docker, integrated with Airflow DAGs for end-to-end orchestration.
Worked on Spark transformation, data ingestion automation, and predictive analytics integrations with LLM-based systems.

experience.title: Mentor
description: Guided and mentored over 120+ students in Data Structures, Algorithms, and coding interview preparation.
Conducted mock interviews, problem-solving sessions, and code reviews to improve algorithmic thinking and competitive programming skills.
Helped students enhance their debugging, optimization, and analytical reasoning abilities.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science Engineering
education.institution: Geethanjali College of Engineering and Technology, Hyderabad

education.board: Telangana State Board of Intermediate Education (TSBIE)
Telangana State Board of Secondary Education (TSBST)

projects.title: Customer Feedback AI Automation Agent
description: Built a fully automated AI Agent using n8n and Google Gemini API to analyze, categorize, and route feedback with minimal manual intervention.
Integrated classification into Complaints, Compliments, and Feature Requests, with Slack notifications and Airtable data logging.
Developed a personalized email response automation system via Gmail API for improved engagement.

projects.title: Resume Scanner (AI-Powered Resume Analysis Tool)
description: Developed an AI-powered resume parser that extracts and highlights key data using Google Gemini API.
Built a React-Tailwind UI and backend with Node.js and MySQL for resume data management.
Implemented AI-driven suggestions for improvement based on job descriptions.

projects.title: Deep Klarity
description: Developed a song lyrics generator across multiple genres with an integrated guessing game mode using NLP models and generative AI.

projects.title: Astra Agritech
description: Developed a web platform enabling farmers to sell produce directly to consumers, eliminating middlemen and ensuring fair pricing.
Added AI-powered market analytics to help farmers make data-driven decisions about demand and pricing.

projects.title: World Tracker
description: Created a fully customizable news aggregator platform that curates global news based on keyword interest and category selection.
Integrated personalization with AI-driven news recommendations and sentiment-based filters.

certifications: Data Science using Python – NSIC Internship Program
